content: this amigurumi is crocheted in cotton yarn with a 3 mm hook and measures aprox 10 tall this pattern is great for beginners to intermediate crocheters that love peanuts this pattern is crocheted in a spiral and uses us terms materials - 1 yellow yarn ball i ve used mercerized cotton - a 3mm hook or the most fitting hook for your yarn - a small quantity of black yarn or thread to embroider the eyes - stuffing - tapestry needle stitch marker and ball-point pins
